title: Is only my macbook has huge delays in new client???
body:
Well, just hear about riot gonna replace the legacy client soon, I just want to "check" or ask why the new client in Mac has such a wired and huge delay(Not in game). For example, I had the last pick in rank, sometimes I was struggling with what champ should I play or which one work best for the team and it took almost the whole time. Because of the delay, I locked in the champ I chose before cuz that champ remained on the screen. And also, it's so hard to open the masteries page as well. Sometimes it just stuck there and not pups up.
I hope riot can fix that but I just wanna see how many 'APPLE' players have the same problem

replies.body:
Some players experience some performance issues in the Beta Client as a result of limited system resources. You may be able to resolve this by jumping into the client settings (cog icon, top-right) and **enabling** "Low Spec mode" and **disabling** "Animation".

http://image.prntscr.com/image/598e949fe2904c85b3220875cf13760f.png

Let me know if this helped!
